comments.html: An update to this book would indeed be very cool! Having just recently read it, I'd say it was still pretty useful despite having been published in 2000. Even without the platform-specific details, the author does a great job in making the reader understand IOS as an actual operating system with memory space and processes, rather than merely a black box with a CLI.
